nodes.text: The Bastion Second Fleet was one of the fleets in the Navy of the Empire-in-exile in 137 ABY. Led by Admiral Edouard Fenel, the fleet participated in the Battle of Ralltiir. This fleet had a red chevron on its capital ships, but it is unknown whether this could be a permanent fleet emblem or else could have been specifically applied to the fleet as a mark of recognition for the Galactic Alliance Remnant's ships.
